sentences.en: " CNN announces that we call Florida in the Al Gore column. "
sentences.cn: “ CNN宣布佛州为阿尔·戈尔的得胜区. ”

sentences.en: At Winchell Donut Shops in California, Gore donuts areoutselling Bushes.
sentences.cn: 在加州的温歇尔甜甜圈店, 戈尔甜甜圈卖得比布什甜甜圈好.

sentences.en: Fossa cubitalis place can flap repeatedly, appear even slight gore.
sentences.cn: 肘窝处可反复拍打, 甚至出现轻微淤血.

sentences.en: Gore angered by decision to keep manual recount deadline.
sentences.cn: 戈尔阵营对维持人工计票做最后期限愤怒.

sentences.en: Gore drops out of election race , will address nation.
sentences.cn: 戈尔即将发表电视谈话,宣布败选.

sentences.en: Gore narrowly lost the 2000 presidential election to George W . Bush.
sentences.cn: 戈尔在2000年总统大选中以细微的差别输给了布什总统.

sentences.en: He lay there rolling'round in the welter of his gore.
sentences.cn: 他放置在那里旋转'他的流出血翻滚的回合.

sentences.en: He likes movies with plenty of blood and gore (= violence ) .
sentences.cn: 他喜欢看很暴力血腥的电影。

sentences.en: Highly purified salt is produced by the gore film decontamination technology.
sentences.cn: 研究用戈尔膜分离净化盐水生产出高纯度工业盐.

sentences.en: In that case, Al Gore and the IPCC seem pretty good - though controversial - choices.
sentences.cn: 这样,虽然充满争议, 戈尔和IPCC却是很不错的人选.

sentences.en: In the book, Gore betrays familiarity with history, economics, even science.
sentences.cn: 在这本新书中,高尔不经意流露, 他娴熟历史 、 经济, 甚至科学.

sentences.en: Mr DiIulio advised both Al Gore and Mr Bush.
sentences.cn: 迪由里奥之后又向戈尔和布什两人进言.

sentences.en: Mr Gore has been pushing them to do just that.
sentences.cn: 戈尔也正是在这方面在政客中游说.

sentences.en: The dog was all gore - blood when it came back from the battle.
sentences.cn: 当那只狗从战地回来的时候,全身鲜血淋漓.

sentences.en: The fox lay dying in a pool of gore.
sentences.cn: 狐狸倒在血泊中奄奄一息.

sentences.en: There were pools of blood and gore on the pavement.
sentences.cn: 人行道上有一摊摊血和血块。

words.tran_cn: 淤血；[纺][建]三角形布；[外科]流出的血

phrases.tran_cn: n. 阿尔戈尔（前美国副总统）

trans.tran_cn: 流出的血，血块，（衣服或帆上加缝的）三角形布条，三角形地带
trans.tran_en: a tapering or triangular piece of material used in making a shaped skirt, umbrella, etc

trans.tran_cn: （动物）用角撞伤，用牙刺破，缝以补裆，顶，（礁石）撞通（船身）
